about_the_game:
You just woke up from a coma and need to reach the Jersey Shore immediately.
Playback Trauma: In Sickness takes place in an established universe over the course of a single night. On your journey you will meet new people, make a friend, find buried treasure, and answer existential questions about yourself and the world around you.

Features:

Gameplay: Follow the story of Jay, a recently awoken coma patient as he treks across New Jersey with a new friend. Make choices, meet people, see new places, and learn to embrace the excitement of the future

- Black, white, and red hand-drawn artstyle
- Get to know a new friend on a deeper level and explore the world of New Jersey together
- Rotoscope animation style
- Meet new people on your journey and experience the psychological horror that comes with each encounter

short_description: You have just woken up from a coma and need to reach the Jersey Shore immediately. You have no car, no money, and no pants. Take an ordinary hitchhike across New Jersey on an extraordinary night, and try to reach your destination in one piece
